scripts.push and publish: git push && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm publish
scripts.android install: rmdir android /s /q & npm run build && npx cap add android && npx cap sync && npx capacitor-assets generate --android && copy "google-services.json" "android/app/google-services.json" && npx cap open android
scripts.android update: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx capacitor-assets generate --android && copy "google-services.json" "android/app/google-services.json" && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: rmdir ios /s /q & npm run build && npx cap add ios && npx cap sync && npx capacitor-assets generate --ios && npx cap copy ios && cd ios/App/ && pod reintegrate && pod install && cd ./../../ && npx cap open ios
